actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-253.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-253) Authorizes the Senate Committee on the Judiciary to make expenditures, not to exceed $3,111,700, for hearings and investigations.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary for inquiries and investigations.
